required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.official_title: Reduction of Ischemic-reperfusion Injury by Ex-vivo ATG-perfusion of Kidneys and Livers Prior Organ Transplantation

brief_summary.textblock:
The increasing demand for organ transplantation and the shortage of available organs limit the success of organ transplantation programs. Consequently, acceptance of expanded criteria donor (ECD) organs with the consequences of higher risk of unfavorable transplantation outcome has become an increasing reality. Among the most prominent characteristics distinguishing ECD from Standard Criteria Donors (SCD) are risk factors including brain death (BD) or prolonged cold ischemia time (CI) amplifying ischemia reperfusion injury (IRI). Currently there are no standard regimens to improve the quality of ECD organs. Therefore, donor organ treatment might be a promising approach to substantially improve organ quality. It will be investigated whether the application of the peri-operative perfusion of kidneys and livers with the polyclonal antibody rabbit antithymocyte globulin (rATG) ameliorates IRI.
This trial is designed as a parallel armed randomized controlled trial.

primary_outcome.description: Graft function from baseline defined as serum creatinine (KTx arm) and aspartate transaminase (LTx arm).

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Days 1-7 post transplantation, month 3, month 6, month 12
secondary_outcome.description: Graft function from baseline defined as serum creatinine (mg/dL) for the KTx arm.

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Days 1-7 post transplantation, month 3, month 6, month 12
secondary_outcome.description: Graft function from baseline defined as glomerular filtration rate (ml/min/1.73M2) for the KTx arm.

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Days 1-7 post transplantation, month 3, month 6, month 12
secondary_outcome.description: Graft function from baseline defined as serum urea (mg/dL) for the KTx arm.

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Days 1-7 post transplantation, month 3, month 6, month 12
secondary_outcome.description: Graft function from baseline defined as aspartate transaminase (mg/dL) for LTx arm.

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Days 1-7 post transplantation, month 3, month 6, month 12
secondary_outcome.description: Graft function from baseline defined as alanine transaminase (mg/dL) for LTx arm.

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Days 1-7 post transplantation, month 3, month 6, month 12
secondary_outcome.description: Graft function from baseline defined as total serum bilirubin (mg/dL) for LTx arm.

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Days 1-7 post transplantation, month 3, month 6, month 12
secondary_outcome.description: Graft function from baseline defined as gamma-glutamyl transpeptidase (mg/dL) for LTx arm.

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Days 1-7 post transplantation, month 3, month 6, month 12
secondary_outcome.description: Graft function from baseline defined as alkaline phosphatase (mg/dL) for LTx arm.

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Days 1-7 post transplantation, month 3, month 6, month 12
secondary_outcome.description: Graft function from baseline defined as quick value (%) for LTx arm.

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Day zero, at the time point of transplantation
secondary_outcome.description: Recipient age (years).

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Day zero, at the time point of transplantation
secondary_outcome.description: Donor age (years).

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Day zero, at the time point of transplantation
secondary_outcome.description: Recipient BMI (weight (lb) / [height (in)]2 x 703).

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Day zero, at the time point of transplantation
secondary_outcome.description: Donor BMI (weight (lb) / [height (in)]2 x 703).

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Day zero, at the time point of transplantation
secondary_outcome.description: Recipient sex.

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Day zero, at the time point of transplantation
secondary_outcome.description: Donor sex.

secondary_outcome.time_frame: during transplantation
secondary_outcome.description: Cold ischemia time (hours) from cross-clamping until start of anastomosis.

secondary_outcome.time_frame: during transplantation
secondary_outcome.description: Warm ischemia time (hours) is the time from start of anastomosis until reperfusion.

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Day zero, at the time point of transplantation
secondary_outcome.description: Presence of panel-reactive antibodies (%) in KTx recipients.

secondary_outcome.time_frame: after transplantation
secondary_outcome.description: Hospital stay (days) after transplantation

secondary_outcome.time_frame: after transplantation
secondary_outcome.description: Intensive care unit stay (days) after transplantation

secondary_outcome.time_frame: up to 12 month
secondary_outcome.description: Death rate in the investigated groups.

secondary_outcome.time_frame: up to 12 month
secondary_outcome.description: Graft loss rate in the investigated groups.

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Day zero, at the time point of transplantation
secondary_outcome.description: Human leukocyte antigen mismatches in KTx recipients.

secondary_outcome.time_frame: after transplantation
secondary_outcome.description: Development of delayed graft function (requirement of dialysis within the first 7 post operative days) in KTx recipients.

secondary_outcome.measure: Experimental analysis of perioperative taken biopsies
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Peri-operatively (zero hour biopsy)
secondary_outcome.description: mRNA Expression of pro-inflammatory and anti-inflammatory cytokine/chemokine pattern in biopsies will be analysed to evaluate immunactivation of the organ

secondary_outcome.measure: Experimental analysis of peripheral blood monunuclear cells
secondary_outcome.time_frame: prior transplantation, days 1-7 post transplantation, month 3, month 6, month 12 for lymphocyte expression analysis of peripheral blood
secondary_outcome.description: Leukocyte-composition and activation pattern will be analysed from peripheral blood via flow cytometry of the recipient and the donor

arm_group.description: Transplant recipients receiving an rATG-perfused kidney or liver
Transplant recipients receiving a control-perfused kidney or liver.

intervention.intervention_name: organ perfusion with rabbit anti-thymocyte globulin (rATG)

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- patients receiving a kidney or liver transplant from deceased donors
Exclusion Criteria:
- Hepatitis C Virus/Human Immunodeficiency Virus, undergoing re-transplantation or under a public guardian
